name: Locate Special Diet
tag_list: gluten-free, vegetarian, vegan, organic, eco-friendly, restaurant-finder, grocery-store-finder
overview:
Locate Special Diet helps people find local businesses that cater to a gluten-free, vegetarian or organic lifestyle.

We currently have a database of approximately 30,000 businesses in over 27 U.S. cities. We are adding new businesses every week!

How Our Service Works Create a free account and customize your location and dietary needs. Search local businesses, submit businesses, and add photos, tips, menus, favorites and more. Once your business has been approved by our Locate Special Diet team, we will add it to our database.

How We Help Locate Special Diet has simplified the search process for finding businesses that cater to a special diet lifestyle. Eating out when you are gluten-free, vegetarian or organic can be a challenge. We’ve created a product that makes this process easier. We’ve done the search process for you and have built a large database full of businesses that cater to your particular lifestyle. Locate Special Diet makes it easy to search businesses, read public tips from other users, and view menus for various restaurants. Users are able to customize their preferred location & dietary preferences, as well as share tips, pictures and menus.
